# orxe-input-container

Input containers can be used as a wrapper for Input, Dropdown, and Autosuggest components

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

```html
<!-- Input Container -->
<orxe-input-container>
  Your input or select element goes here
</orxe-input-container>
```

## Properties

| Property             | Attribute              | Description                                                      | Type      | Default |
| -------------------- | ---------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `errorMessage`       | `error-message`        | This property is used to show error message                      | `string`  | ``      |
| `alwaysFloatedLabel` | `always-floated-label` | This property is used to add floating behaviour to label         | `boolean` | `false` |
| `invalid`            | `invalid`              | This property is used to change the input container design       | `boolean` | `false` |
| `labelValue`         | `label-value`          | This property is used to pass the label value to input container | `string`  | ``      |
